rules.description: Caps Lock to Escape on single press, Control on press and hold.
DMPSpaceFN: Space+b to Space (hold to repeat)
DMPSpaceFN: Space+[hjkl] to Left, Down, Up, Right
DMPSpaceFN: Space+u to Home, Space+o to End
DMPSpaceFN: Space+y to Page Up, Space+n to Page Down
DMPSpaceFN: Space+p to Print Screen, Space+Open Bracket ([) to Scroll Lock, Space+Close Bracket (]) to Pause, Space+Backspace to Forward Delete, Space+Backslash (\) to Insert

DMPSpaceFN: Backquote (`) to Escape, Space+[1-9] to F[1-9], Space+0 to F10, Space+Hyphen (-) to F11, Space+Equal Sign (=) to F12, Space+e to Escape, Space+m to Backtick (`), Space+Comma to Tilde (~), Space+Slash (/) to Menu
DMPSpaceFN: Space+w to Ctrl-w, Space+c to Ctrl-c, Space+tab to Command+tab
